TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LineAnchor extends System.Enum

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Determines the shapes of connector points on a workflow design surface.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
Connectors are the lines rendered on the workflow design surface between interconnected activity designers. The ends of each line are called connector points, which are where the lines attach to the activity designers that they connect. LineAnchor provides values that determine the appearance of the connector points.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor Arrow = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The connector point is an arrow.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor ArrowAnchor = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The connector point is an arrow anchor.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor Diamond = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The connector point is a diamond.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor DiamondAnchor = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The connector point is an diamond anchor.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor Rectangle = int32(7)

Docs.summary: The connector point is a rectangle.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor RectangleAnchor = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The connector point is a rectangle anchor.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor Round = int32(5)

Docs.summary: The connector point is a circle.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor RoundAnchor = int32(6)

Docs.summary: The connector point is a circle anchor.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor RoundedRectangle = int32(9)

Docs.summary: The connector point is a rounded rectangle.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor RoundedRectangleAnchor = int32(10)

Docs.summary: The connector point is a rounded rectangle anchor.
